Interface ConfigurationManagement

      • removeClientLogo

      • setPrimaryAuthentication

        void setPrimaryAuthentication(String externalSystemId,
                              boolean allowDBAuth,
                              String currentPrimaryAuthentication)
                       throws PrimaryAuthenticationException
        Parameters:
        externalSystemId - The ID of the external system which should be made the primary authentication system. If this is null, the current primary authentication system will be removed.
        allowDBAuth - True, if authentication against the internal database should be allowed.
        currentPrimaryAuthentication - The ID of the external system which is the current primary authentication system. Can be null if there is currently no primary authentication.
        Throws:
        PrimaryAuthenticationException - Thrown if there is no active configuration for the externalSystemId or no configuration for the currentPrimaryAuthentication. This Exception is also thrown if allowDBAuth is false and there are no client managers that can authenticate against the new primary system.

      • updateApplicationSettings

        void updateApplicationSettings(Map<ApplicationConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
                        throws AuthorizationException
        Updates or creates the provided application settings.
        Parameters:
        settings - The updated settings.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Exception.

      • updateClientSetting

        void updateClientSetting(ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant key,
                         String value)
        Update the given setting using the key and value. If the key already exists it will be updated.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the setting.
        value - The updated value.

      • updateClientSettings

        void updateClientSettings(Map<ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
        Updates or creates the provided client configuration settings.
        Parameters:
        settings - The updated settings.
